snippet: A Volkswagen lawyer said on Thursday that the company would like hundreds of federal civil lawsuits filed against the carmaker over its emissions cheating scandal to be consolidated in Michigan.
abstract: Volkswagen lawyer Jeffrey L Chase asks New Orleans federal court to consolidate lawsuits connected to carmaker’s emissions scandal to Michigan, state where company is working with Environmental Protection Agency.
lead_paragraph: A Volkswagen lawyer said on Thursday that the company would like hundreds of federal civil lawsuits filed against the carmaker over its emissions cheating scandal to be consolidated in Michigan.

headline.print_headline: VW Asks to Consolidate Lawsuits in Michigan
headline.main: Volkswagen Asks to Consolidate Lawsuits in Michigan
